Mark Plug and Play table with static comment.

StringTable.String: The Win32_PnPEntity WMI class represents the properties of a Plug and Play device. Plug and Play entities are shown as entries in the Device Manager located in Control Panel. See Microsoft online document for individual field descriptions under each of the devices below.

String.loc.comment: Text to display when a rule or group of rules failed
Text to display when a rule or group of rules passed
Symptom string for warning message: WarnConfig10
Cause string for warning message: WarnConfig10

StringTable.String: A device has a configuration problem that prevents it from starting properly.

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnConfig10

StringTable.String: The device, {warndescrip}, cannot start properly. It may not have the correct driver installed or may be experiencing a hardware failure. The Plug and Play ID for this device is {warndeviceid}.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnConfig10

StringTable.String: 1. Verify the correct driver is installed.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnConfig10

StringTable.String: 2. Try updating the drivers using Windows Update.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnConfig10

StringTable.String: 3. Check with the manufacturer for an updated driver.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnConfig10

StringTable.String: 4. Attempt to uninstall and then reinstall the device using Device Manager.

String.loc.comment: First resolution detail string for warning message: WarnConfig10

StringTable.String: Explanation of Error Codes Generated by Device Manager

String.loc.comment: Second resolution detail string for warning message: WarnConfig10
Symptom string for warning message: WarnConfig22
Cause string for warning message: WarnConfig22

StringTable.String: A device is disabled preventing it from working properly.

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnConfig22

StringTable.String: The device, {warndescrip}, is disabled. If this device is no longer used it may be intentionally disabled. The Plug and Play ID for this device is {warndeviceid}.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnConfig22

StringTable.String: 1. Determine if you need the device.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnConfig22

StringTable.String: 2. If you need the device, enable it in Device Manager.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnConfig22

StringTable.String: 3. If you do not use the device it can be left disabled.

String.loc.comment: First resolution detail string for warning message: WarnConfig22

StringTable.String: Explanation of Error Codes Generated by Device Manager

String.loc.comment: Second resolution detail string for warning message: WarnConfig22
Symptom string for warning message: WarnConfig28
Cause string for warning message: WarnConfig28

StringTable.String: A driver has not been installed for this device preventing it from working properly.

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnConfig28

StringTable.String: The device driver for {warndescrip} has not been installed. This device will not be available until the correct device driver is installed.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnConfig28

StringTable.String: 1. Try installing the drivers using Windows Update.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnConfig28

StringTable.String: 2. Install the drivers that are on the installation media that came with the device.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnConfig28

StringTable.String: 3. Check with the manufacturer for an updated driver.

String.loc.comment: First resolution detail string for warning message: WarnConfig28

StringTable.String: Explanation of Error Codes Generated by Device Manager

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnConfigGeneric
Cause string for warning message: WarnConfigGeneric

StringTable.String: A device has a configuration problem that prevents it from working properly.

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnConfigGeneric

StringTable.String: The device, {warndescrip}, is reporting "{warnerror}". This device will not be available until the issue is resolved. The Plug and Play ID for this device is {warndeviceid}.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnConfigGeneric

StringTable.String: 1. Verify the correct driver is installed.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnConfigGeneric

StringTable.String: 2. Try updating the drivers using Windows Update.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnConfigGeneric

StringTable.String: 3. Check with the manufacturer for an updated driver.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnConfigGeneric

StringTable.String: 4. Attempt to uninstall and then reinstall the device using Device Manager.

String.loc.comment: First resolution detail string for warning message: WarnConfigGeneric

StringTable.String: Explanation of Error Codes Generated by Device Manager

String.loc.comment: Second resolution detail string for warning message: WarnConfigGeneric
Symptom string for warning message: WarnStatusGeneric
Cause string for warning message: WarnStatusGeneric

StringTable.String: A device has reported a "Not OK" status.

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnStatusGeneric

StringTable.String: The device, {warndescrip}, is reporting a bad status value. This device will not be available until the issue is resolved. The Plug and Play ID for this device is {warndeviceid}.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnStatusGeneric

StringTable.String: 1. Verify the correct driver is installed.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnStatusGeneric

StringTable.String: 2. Try updating the drivers using Windows Update.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnStatusGeneric

StringTable.String: 3. Check with the manufacturer for an updated driver.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnStatusGeneric

StringTable.String: 4. Attempt to uninstall and then reinstall the device using Device Manager.

String.loc.comment: First resolution detail string for warning message: WarnStatusGeneric

StringTable.String: Explanation of Error Codes Generated by Device Manager

String.loc.comment: Second resolution detail string for warning message: WarnStatusGeneric
